subject: AI & Agents
title: China vs. America: The Real AI Race
description: A quick, practical guide to China vs. America: The Real AI Race.

hook.text: Headlines scream about the US-China AI race. But the reality is more collaboration than pure competition.

buildup.text: Both nations invest billions in AI research, with different strengths and approaches.

discovery.text: China leads in AI applications and data volume. The US leads in foundational research and chip design.

twist.text: Many breakthroughs come from researchers who've worked in both countries. Science crosses borders.

climax.text: Export controls on chips and talent restrictions may slow both sides by fragmenting the research ecosystem.

punchline.text: The race narrative sells headlines. The science needs collaboration.

quiz.question: How do US and China AI strengths differ?
options: China leads in applications; the US leads in foundational research and chips
Neither country is investing in AI
